greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n-th sextic factorial number divided by 3.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..345
formula: D-finite with recurrence: a(n) +3*(-2*n+1)*a(n-1)=0. - _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 24 2020
program: (MAGMA) F:=Factorial; [3^(n-1)*F(2*n)/(2^n*F(n)): n in [1..20]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 11 2019
(Sage) f=factorial; [3^(n-1)*f(2*n)/(2^n*f(n)) for n in (1..20)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 11 2019
(GAP) F:=Factorial;; List([1..20], n-> 3^(n-1)*F(2*n)/(2^n*F(n))); # _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 11 2019
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
